content:
US Vice President @Mike_Pence and his wife @KarenPence will publicly receive a Covid-19 vaccine on Friday to promote the safety and efficacy of the vaccine and build confidence among the American people.

#CovidVaccine #PfizerBioNTech #US
date: US Vice President Mike Pence to take Covid-19 vaccine publiclyThe US started its Covid-19 vaccine rollout nationwide on Monday as the death toll in the pandemic topped 300,000 in the country.dtnext.in
